/usr/bin/g++    -Wall -Wextra -pedantic -std=c++11 -O2 -g -DNDEBUG   -Wl,-rpath  -Wl,/usr/lib/openmpi/lib  -Wl,--enable-new-dtags CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/communicator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/compute.cpp.o CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/geometry.cpp.o CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/grid.cpp.o CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/iterator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/parameter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/solver.cpp.o CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/vtk.cpp.o CMakeFiles/numsim.dir/src/visu.cpp.o  -o numsim -rdynamic -lSDL2 /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/openmpi/lib
